detailed:
Brings up a list of commands available if s!help is used.
If the optional arguments commandname and detailed are used
then a detailed description will appear for the command, such as
this one.
example: "s!help help detailed" will bring up this message!

points.description: Sends you a message with your amount of points
detailed: Tells you the amount of points you have on the current server.

Allows you to start a game of blackjack!
The amount is the amount staked in the game
Upon winning your amount is doubled, otherwise its the amount subtracted.
When starting, you may either choose HIT or STAY
You have one minute to choose before the game times out.
If you choose HIT, and get an additional card until you STAY.
If you or the house goes over a total value of 21, then the game ends.
